Comment: Price action is less based on the underlying and more so in response, or the prediction, to what other traders are doing.
Author: krozarEQ

Comment: The other problem is that the market is about predictions. I think a lot of people out there still believe that Trump is going to make a great deal with China or at least that he’ll back down before too much damage is done.  Another part is that, to be frank, these aren’t really American companies in anything, but name. Apple has factories all over the world and sells their product all over the world. Google and Meta barely recognize national borders. If things get real bad maybe they’ll reincorporate in another country, but for now it’s enough that they are more integrated into the global economy than the American one.
Author: SyntheticSlime
